title: Shameful coronavirus pranks flood media.
itunes:title: Shameful coronavirus pranks flood media.
description:
A new wave of coronavirus crimes is sweeping across the country. From pranks that put citizens at risk to outright fraud, the list of shysters grows.


Joining Nancy Grace today to discuss:

  • Kathleen Murphy - North Carolina, Family Attorney, www.ncdomesticlaw.com 
  • James Shelnutt - 27 years Atlanta Metro Major Case detective, SWAT Officer (RET) Attorney
  • Joseph Scott Morgan - Professor of Forensics Jacksonville State University, Author,"Blood Beneath My Feet"
  • Dr Angela Arnold - Psychiatrist, Atlanta Ga
  • Tina Moore - New York Post reporter

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
